content: In order to get from class to object, we "build" our object by instantiation. Instantiation simply means to create an instance of a class. Instance and object are very similar terms and are sometimes interchangeable, but remember that an instance refers to a specific object, which was created from a class.
stemmed: In order get class object , `` build '' object instanti . instanti simpli mean creat instanc class . instanc object similar term sometim interchang , rememb instanc refer specif object , creat class .
